name: Dark Primeape

abilities.name: Frenzy
abilities.text: If Dark Primeape does any damage while it's Confused (even to itself), it does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Frenzied Attack
attacks.text: Dark Primeape is now Confused (after doing damage).

flavorText: Although Primeapes have always been mean, lately they seem to be becoming even more vicious and frenzied.

strengths: Frenzy boosts all damage by 30 while Confused
Frenzied Attack deals 40 + 30 = 70 damage when Confused
synergies: Cards that cure Confusion when needed

competitiveHistory: Dark Primeape had a unique mechanic where being Confused actually made it stronger. Frenzy adding 30 damage while Confused meant Frenzied Attack could deal 70 damage, and even hitting yourself did 30 extra. It was a high-risk, high-reward attacker.

rulings.ruling: Frenzy adds 30 damage to ALL damage Dark Primeape does while Confused, including self-damage from Confusion.
